text: Harrisburg is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is in Lincoln County, about three miles south of Sioux Falls. It became a city in 1873, and 6,732 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Harrisburg website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1873 establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Harrisburg, South Dakota
